Interface MoveInterface

public interface MoveInterface

Represents a move a player wishes to make DO NOT CHANGE THIS FILE

Version:
0.1
Author:
Stephen McGough

Method Summary
abstract  int getXPosition()
          Get the x coordinate of the move.
abstract  int getYPosition()
          Get the y coordnate of the move.
abstract  boolean hasConceed()
          Has the player conceeded in this move?
abstract  boolean setConceeded()
          Indicate that the player has conceeded in this move.
abstract  boolean setPosition(int x, int y)
          Set the position that the Player wishes to use - both x and y coordinate.

setPosition

boolean setPosition(int x,
                    int y)
                    throws InvalidPositionException
Set the position that the Player wishes to use - both x and y coordinate.

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate
y - the y coordinate
Returns:
true indicating value set correctly
Throws:
InvalidPositionException - The position is invalid. E.g. both x and y are negative.
